      • xorWithKey

        public byte[] xorWithKey(byte[] a,
                         byte[] key,
                         boolean flag,
                         android.content.Context con)

        Encrypts and decrypts with Base64 encoding for hashing and security also adds the functionality of AES encryption using the encryption class

        Parameters:
        a - a bytearray to encrypt/decrypt
        key - a bytearray to use for decryp/encrypt key
        con - a base Context to work with
        flag - true = decryption, false= encryption
        See Also:
        class encryption
